    • setMillisecondsPermissionTimeout

      void setMillisecondsPermissionTimeout(int ms)
      Set how long to wait for permission to open the camera before giving up
      Parameters:
      ms - milliseconds to wait for

      Parameters:

    • getExposureControl

      ExposureControl getExposureControl()
      Gets the ExposureControl for this webcam. Please see that interface's javadoc for how to use it. It is an interface provided directly by the SDK UVC driver, not EasyOpenCV.
      Returns:
      the ExposureControl for this webcam

      CameraCalibrationIdentity getCalibrationIdentity()
